title: When battery saver is on, extended execution gets revoked, even when using AlwaysAllowed
body: Before requesting extended execution, I prompt the user to let the app run always in the background, using BackgroundExecutionManager.RequestAccessKindAsync with the AlwaysAllowed enum.

comments.body: It looks like that even when not on battery saver, Extended Execution will get revoked when the system 'sleeps'.
